description: A configuration of the sprite animation.
title: SpriteAnimationConfig

___start.description: The index of the starting frame.
___start.title: Start

___frameRate.description: The number of frame per second to use for this animation. That modifies the speed of the animation.
___frameRate.title: Frame rate

___loop.description: If loop is set to true, the sprite animation will loop
___loop.title: Loop

___end.description: The index of the ending frame.
___end.title: End
